content.rendered:
Hot Titles for a Hot Summer!

Here’s a look at some of the popular titles hitting our shelves this week.

Beach Reads and Audiobooks

Try these poolside page-turners for some relaxing weekend reading, or take them on your long-awaited summer vacation. Not looking forward to hours of “I Spy” while traveling? Grab an audiobook for the road!

Armed Forces Day

Summer Reading Lists

Get a head start on your summer assignments. Please e-mail your school reading lists to office@gottwalsbooks.com, and we will make sure we have your books in stock.

excerpt.rendered: Try these poolside page-turners for some relaxing weekend reading, or take them on your long-awaited summer vacation. Not looking forward to hours of “I Spy” while traveling? Grab an audiobook for the road!
